headline: Elevance Health Hit By Medicaid Troubles, Trims Outlook
summary: Elevance Health Inc. (NYSE:ELV) shares plummeted nearly 12% on Thursday after the health insurer reported second-quarter 2025 adjusted earnings that missed analyst expectations and significantly lowered its full-year guidance, overshadowing strong revenue growth. The company reported second-quarter 2025 revenues of $49.42 billion, up 14.3% year over year, higher than the consensus of $48.34 billion. The increase was driven by higher premium yields in the Health Benefits segment, recently closed
